seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Meet the coaches behind SustainSage and see how our ICF-aligned practice supports people building a life in the UK with consent and care.

hero.title: Coaches who hold space for careful change
hero.subtitle: We build calm, honest conversations so you can think without performance.

mission.title: What guides us
mission.description: We design coaching that honours agency, community and care work.
bullets: ICF-aligned ethics: confidentiality, clear agreements, informed consent.
Attention to migration, race, class, gender and health realities.
Partnership over prescriptionsâ€”we create room to notice and choose.

roots.title: Where we come from
roots.description: SustainSage grew out of navigating cross-border careers and unpaid care ourselves.
bullets: Years of coaching people moving between countries and roles.
Community building with migrants, carers and multilingual teams.
Practice that respects trauma awareness without claiming to be therapy.

coaches.title: Your coaches
coaches.subtitle: Co-founders who have rebuilt life in new countries and roles more than once.

cards.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
cards.summary: Service designer and coach helping clients translate values across systems.

cards.name: Yi-Ling Lai
cards.summary: Learning facilitator and coach holding multilingual, care-centred spaces.

practice.title: How we work together
practice.description: A typical collaboration is paced, transparent and co-created.
bullets: We begin with clear agreements on goals, boundaries and preferred rhythms.
Sessions mix reflection with practical planning that you choose.
We review regularly and close well, even if that means signposting elsewhere.

boundaries.title: What coaching is not
boundaries.description: Being honest about limits keeps you safe and informed.
bullets: Not therapy, counselling, legal or immigration advice.
Not crisis response or safeguarding investigations.
Not performance management done on someone else’s agenda.

cta.title: Curious whether we’re a fit?
cta.body: Share a snapshot of your context. We’ll suggest next steps or signpost other support with no pressure.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
